From Wikipedia:



 Jonny Lang (born Jon Gordon Langseth, Jr., January 29, 1981) is a Grammy Award-winning American blues, gospel, and rock singer, songwriter, guitarist and recording artist. Lang's music is notable for both his unusual voice, which at 13 was compared to that of a 40-year-old blues veteran, and for his guitar solos. His solo patterns have especially been noted[who?] for his frequent use of wide vibratos.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Smokin is the first album by American blues guitarist Jonny Lang, independently released in 1995 under the name Kid Jonny Lang & The Big Bang.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

"Kid" Jonny Lang - vocals, guitar
Ted "Lightnin' Boy" Larsen - guitars, backing vocals
Michael Rey Larsen - drums, backing vocals
Jeff Hayes - bass guitar, backing vocals
Steve Cropper - guitars
